WorkItem.Description:
Hello and good morning,

We have a problem with server 2016 (WSUS).

Server version is different from console version. You won't be able to publish/review updates.

Comments.Message:
I am currently running WSUS on Server 2016

WPP release 1.3.1702.10
Server Version 10.0.14393.1358
Consol Version  10.0.14393.0

I have checked the box in settins:  Ignore consol and server version mismatch.

Everything has been working fine for months.

Steve
